CompanyProfile.title: CompanyProfile
CompanyProfile.description: Stores company branding information like name and logos.

logoUrl.description: URL of the uploaded company logo.

iconUrl.description: URL of the uploaded company icon (e.g., for favicons).

PageContent.title: PageContent
PageContent.description: Stores the content for a specific page, broken down into sections.

title.description: The user-friendly title of the page (e.g., 'Home Page').

sections.description: An array of content sections for this page.

id.description: Unique identifier for the section within the page (e.g., 'hero', 'features').

content.description: The main text content for the section.

imageUrl.description: URL for an optional background or feature image.

definition.description: Stores all content for a specific page, editable by authenticated users.

params.name: pageId
params.description: The unique identifier for the page (e.g., 'home').

params.name: profileId
params.description: The unique identifier for the company profile.

firestore.reasoning: This Firestore data structure allows for modular content management. Each page's content is stored in a separate document within the 'pages' collection. This makes it easy to add new pages and edit their content by section.
